text: ai eemaan laanevaalo! maare jaanevaalon ke vishay mein hatyaadand (qisaas) tumapar anivaary kiya gaya, svatantr-svatantr baraabar hai aur gaî€¼ulaam-gulaam baraabar hai aur aurat-aurat baraabar hai. phir yadi kisee ko usake bhaee kee or se kuchh chhoot mil jae to saamaany reeti ka paalan karana chaahie; aur bhale tareeke se use ada karana chaahie. yah tumhaaren rab kee or se ek chhoot aur dayaaluta hai. phir isake baad bho jo zyaadatee kare to usake lie dukhad yaatana hai
